title: Black Lou Wins Husband Of The Year
description: Black Lou wins husband of the year after taking his wife to a 5 ½ hour long Harry Potter play on Broadway. DJ Lou informs Jay and Dan that he won’t go to "Sex Island" because he was invited to a football game by the Houston Texans' J.J. Watt with Pete Correale and Sebastian Maniscalco & everyone is in a good mood after they see Jeff Goldblum playing piano in the SiriusXM lobby.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
